content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-13.0, -48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) extracting iron ore.
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5) storing extracted iron ore.
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5) transferring items to the furnace.

### Coal and Iron Ore Extraction Facility at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) extracting coal.
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -80.5) storing extracted coal.
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0) processing materials.
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5) transferring items to the furnace.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items without having them in inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into another entity. This will prevent errors related to missing items during insertion tasks.

### Errors due to full chests or furnaces
- Regularly check and empty chests and furnaces to avoid warnings about full inventories, which can halt production processes.
